prompt: started my programming journey by learning the fundamentals of C and C++, and focused on academic coursework in electronic communication and internet of things
dove deep into Data Structures and Algorithms using C++ and JavaScript, participating in coding contests and building problem-solving skills
expanded into frontend development by learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, and built my first job-seeking platform 'Jobify'
learned full-stack development by mastering backend technologies like Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, and launched projects like 'QuickCart',Ecommerce and 'VitalCarePlatform'
began exploring AI and ML by building an OCR tool using OpenCV and Google Vision API, and later created a PDF-based RAG system using LangChain, FAISS, and Llama
continued advancing in AI and cloud computing, working with Ollama, Transformers, ElevenLabs, and deploying AI pipelines to cloud environments
